methods.name: getName
methods.description:
The resource name of the Document to get. In the format: projects/{project_id}/databases/{database_id}/documents/{document_path}.

methods.name: getMask
methods.description:
The fields to return. If not set, returns all fields.

If the document has a field that is not present in this mask, that field will not be returned in the response.

Generated from protobuf field .google.firestore.v1beta1.DocumentMask mask = 2;

methods.name: getReadTime

This may not be older than 60 seconds.
